item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor TCAS II Functionality (STC ST02053LA) (EFB Installed)

numlitem.para: Function is secured according to an approved procedure, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.
Select XPNDR Position on Transponder Panel.
Flight Control to ensure TCAS is not required by Foreign States along planned route.

placard.para: Placard TCAS/Transponder Control Panel "TCAS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
